name: Mystic Vale - Vale of the Wild
detailed_description:
Vale of the Wild introduces 54 brand new advancement cards and 18 vale cards to the Mystic Vale base game. This expansion also adds two new mechanics to Mystic Vale, in the form of Leaders and Eclipse Cards.

LEADERS



At the start of each game, you’ll pick which leader you want to side with. Each leader can be upgraded in order to access powerful, unique effects. Pick a leader that supports your playstyle, or try a new approach based on the powers of your chosen leader!

ECLIPSE CARDS



With Eclipse cards, you can make your advancements even stronger. These cards are played just as you would normal advancements, but then you can place advancements on top of them. This opens up a whole new realm of combo possibilities!

'As the struggle to restore the Valley of Life intensifies, the ranks of those combating the curse continues to swell. Some druids, in particular, are rising to the forefront as potent leaders. While they are as varied in their approach and nature as the druidic clans themselves, these servants of Gaia all strive for the day when a wicked king’s bitter wrath no longer taints their world.'
